title: Avoid friendzone like it's hell

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast 

🔥Teaching you how to build a network of desirable women and high-status men

👇 Click the "Men of Action" link below now to forge a high-status lifestyle and join the elites

transcription: {"text": "I think it's really bad for guys to be put in the friend zone by any girl. We had a girl in here one time and she was talking about this. She called them pick me guys. And I thought it was really interesting observation. She's like, I realized that if I put this dude in the friend zone, other girls are going to put this guy in the friend zone too. And I was like, damn, I didn't think about that. That's really important. I think dudes should avoid that like the plague, like anything getting consistently put in the friend zone is bad. There's nothing wrong with being friends with women. That's different. Being friends with women is fine. Being put in the friend zone where I'm shooting my shot with no intent. And then I'm getting put in the friend zone. I think that's problematic.
